resources.string: If a problem has occurred in Student Callout or TeacherKit, Terminate them and try again.\nTo terminate: Press the Recent Apps button then close the two Apps.
You have selected all your students.
I just used TeacherKit Student Callout to engage my students.\nDownload it from Google Play Store using this link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.itworx.tk.studentcallout
Welcome to TeacherKit Student Callout.\nYou can either use demo data or open TeacherKit to export students from your class to TeacherKit Student Callout.
Tap on this button from TeacherKit to export your students to Student Callout to randomly select them
Tap on this button from TeacherKit to go to Student Callout without sporting your students
Tap on this button from Student Callout to go back to TeacherKit
